/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives the viewer a sense of being part of the scene.
